title: Make It Rain
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: The crazy college football weekend, respect for Bill Belichick and your stories from awful job interviews!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on the crazy college football weekend, including Oregon's Mario Cristobal leaving to be the head football coach at Miami (1:42). Plus, why Patriots coach Bill Belichick deserves an apology (18:32), an IYHH including xenobots that are reproducing (26:44) and your voicemails from the "worst" job interview you've ever had (37:09).


IYHH Stories

  1. @whitneykimball says a robot company will pay $200k for your face: https://bit.ly/3DzmUVz
  2. @mattmcfarland shares that “Little Tikes” made a peloton-like bike for kids: https://cnn.it/3Duarm8
  3. @ScottNeumanNPR shares that “living robots” made in a lab have found a new way to self-replicate: https://n.pr/32ToaX1
